Name: Ice Star Tribes
About the game: Hello! , I hope you like my games, and I try to make them interesting for you to play, and thank's God and thank you all! for this, the story is about the Tribes, the small communities that remained on the Ice star. In the far future, small group of people on the cold planet is trying to survive! much time has passed, and new technologies has came, new weapons and the ability to jump in space and time. But despite this all, the human heart left the same, with greed for power and control, Wars made it hard to survive, some animals disappeared, and only two small tribes left on the cold planet of darkness and ice and fighting for its last resources. You are the new hope of this dying world, even the tribes are confronting each other, they do understand that the live of every single person is precious! , and they do not attack, but they are trying other ways to infiltrate the community and control it from inside! They use fear and pressure, they use new generation of Bots, Spikers..that blend with the shadows, Giants to scare the people, and more.. but hope is close, and you are this hope!, Your mission is to eliminate all the threat to the community, destroy the bots and the factories, and jump in time, Find the Time portal to Jump many thousands of years back, to try and build a better future for you and all the people on the ice star, this will mean a Win! features : New Story is still based on the players score, it will change peoples mind in the game about you, but not only the score, any of your moves can bring a new part in the game to live!, You still can and must shoot some enemy bots, and new trained raiders will make your work harder, but on your side, there is a hope too, New weapons!, New Med packs, and new Athletic boosters, that will make your character stronger with every use!, and the new 'Detecting' system, that will help you to search and destroy them all! in the dark and ice!
